name: FMK 🍆💍☠️
description:
Crass but fun! Hit the SHUFFLE button, then you and your friends must decide. Which one will you F!@# 🍆, which will you marry 💍, and which will you kill ☠️? Someone always has to die.

If you don't know who somebody is, tap their name.

Play it on-the-go at okaybenji.github.io/fmk.

Check out the source code at github.com/okaybenji/fmk.
